dist

Class FixedComponentMixtureDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.FixedComponentMixtureDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distribution, java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class FixedComponentMixtureDistribution
extends AbstractDistribution
implements Copyable
    A output distribution that restricts itself to being a mixture of fixed distributions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
